entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Local smoke early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. High 28. Humidex 31. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
